title: Chinese spring rolls
ingredients: ['3 tbsp vegetable oil', '1 tbsp toasted sesame oil', '2 skinless chicken breast fillets, about 300g in total, finely chopped', '4 spring onions, trimmed and thinly sliced', '2 carrots, peeled and coarsely grated', '1 large courgette, coarsely grated', '150g bean sprouts', '220g can water chestnuts, drained and coarsely chopped', '220g can bamboo shoots, drained and coarsely chopped', '2 tbsp soy sauce', '1 tbsp dry sherry', '6 sheets filo pastry, about 270g in total']
